name: Gemini Chase
description:
Gemini Chase is the first indie release by developer duo Xyonon and StudioZyyt. If you encounter any bugs, let us know via the website in the sidebar and we will fix them ASAP.

On the run...

  • Enemies appear in waves and are powered by differently colored energy cores.
  • Match the color of your attacks with the target's core in order to overcome their defenses.
  • Each pirate ship has their own way of being a threat by not only shooting or tackling you, but also supporting their allies.
  • 13 specialized enemies each with multiple behaviors to keep you on your toes.

Defend yourself with...

  • Three unique weapons support diverse playstyles to choose from.
  • Scavenged enemies can upgrade your weapons and unlock powerful special abilities.
  • 15 augmentations provide special charged attacks to your weapons.
  • 18 modifiers boost the base stats of your weapons.

Settle in for...

  • Epic boss fights. Can you complete the full game?
  • Three difficulty levels, ranging from single colour up to chaotic, multi-colour waves where every second counts.
  • Original soundtrack by Xyonon.

    Warning

    This game contains flashing lights that may make it unsuitable for people with photosensitive epilepsy or other photosensitive conditions. Player discretion is advised.
